Notes

Produced for Mighty Steppen Productions Recorded and mixed at Celestial Sounds, New York City Mastered at Frankford/Wayne Mastering Labs, New York City This album is dedicated to the support of the movement to make Martin Luther King Jr.'s birthday a national holiday
